course_title: Special Topics in Religion: Readings in Sanskrit
class_notes:
This is a 1 credit course. 
This course satisfies the Religion major requirement:- Tradition-Hinduism.
We will read selected verses of Vyasa, Valmiki, Kalidasa, Asvaghosha, Bhavabhuti, and others in the original Sanskrit. Prerequisites: ability to read the Devanagari script and a working knowledge of Sanskrit grammar. Instructor approval required.
Email Prof. Shiv Subramaniam @ shiv.kaushik.subramaniam@emory.edu for permission number.
course_description: Variety of subjects pertaining to religion. Content will vary in successive offerings. May be repeated for credit when topic varies.
sections: Class Nbr: 6366, Section #: 13, Type: LEC, Campus: ATL, Meets: W 6-6:50p, Instructor: S. Subramaniam, Status: Open
